trans-unit.resname: PRED·1 | Nalathni Dragon | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying; banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
trans-unit.target: Flying; banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

trans-unit.resname: PRED·1 | Nalathni Dragon | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {R}: CARDNAME gets +1/+0 until end of turn. If this ability has been activated four or more times this turn, sacrifice CARDNAME at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: {R}: CARDNAME gets +1/+0 until end of turn. If this ability has been activated four or more times this turn, sacrifice CARDNAME at the beginning of the next end step.
